attributes.title: Never Lose Enlightenment with Spiritual Alchemy - Sadashivoham 2016
attributes.description:
The deeper intricacies of the Spiritual Alchemy Process are revealed! Paramahamsa Nithyananda explains how the various levels of you - 
physical, physiological, psychological, neurological - are interconnected and have their own systematic way of responding to each other. Experiencing “ups and downs” in any of these 4 can throw off your whole system; even eating one single wrong meal is enough to shatter your whole identity! 

An Alchemist is a person who understands the whole chemistry of physical, physiological, psychological, neurological ups and downs you go through and can use it for your enlightenment. Like how that meal can make you lose your identity, a single Spiritual Alchemy Product can help you retain the Shivattva, Oneness, experience!

These unique enlightenment products will be available only during this Sadashivoham 2016 program! This rare opportunity in which reaching the Ultimate will be made easy by Paramahamsa Nithyananda! 

Register now for your Enlightenment:
bit.ly/sadashivoham2016

Learn more about physical, physiological, psychological, neurological ups and downs:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j2qp-d1Ys58
